channel.title: Creating SWEPs and playermodels for gmod
channel.description:
I have a tiny question since I have searched thick and through. I have no idea how to rig animations and other files for making SWEPs in gmod, I also need to rig playermodels to the skeletal system and animation, but I am unable to find a suitable tutorial to do so.
How may I go about doing this? I'm trying to make Neotokyo SWEPs and playermodels for gmod. After that, I was thinking of doing the thermo-optic as an addon.

item.title: Creating SWEPs and playermodels for gmod
item.dc:creator: LimitBreak
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

All the neotokyo stuff has been ported and made into weapons/player models. Check facepunch.

Alright

Wait a second, do you have a link…?

I haven’t found this stuff.

Read full topic
item.source: Creating SWEPs and playermodels for gmod

How may I go about doing this? I’m trying to make Neotokyo SWEPs and playermodels for gmod. After that, I was thinking of doing the thermo-optic as an addon.
